name: BRENDA JUMPER
description:
Stretch turtleneck cropped jumper. Bought in al London's
Brand: ARTWOOL, knitted in England, Bought ain the mid 80's at a shop on the Kings Road in London. 100% handknitted wool. 

Checked pattern: blacl, navy blue, dark green, wine and yellow.


Measures: All Measures are approximate and taken with the garment lying flat.

Shoulder to shoulder: 35cm; 13,78''
Waist: 22cm; 8,66''
Sleeves lenght: 45cm; 17.72''
Neck width: 16cm; 6,3''
Neck lenght: 17cm; 6,7''

Approximate today size: xs/s It's really smaill, but it's stretch so it can fit more.

Please, contact me for information on international shipment rates from Spain

name: MARIBEL SECRETARY DRESS
description:
70's Beautiful secretary dress. 

Long sleeve
4 Buttons
2 loops for belt (belt not included)
Soft and elastic fabric
Beige background with miniature geometrical pattern in black, grey and red colours

Size: according to the label, 48 yet it is VINTAGE, so it is like a 44 nowadays. Yet, don't get disappointed if you find it too big, it looks awsome for smaller sizes if you stick it to your waist with a nice leather belt!

Measures: All measures are taken with garment lying flat

Shoulder to shoulder: 40 cm; 15,75''
Sleeve lenght: 56cm; 22,05''
Waist: 46cm; 18,11''
Total garment lenght: 110cm; 43,31''

Accesories not included.

name: FLOWERY SKIRT
description:
Probably 70's full skirt
Home dressmade

Colours: flowery design in white, pink, black 
100% cotton
Pleated on the waist, it is cut on the bias for a fuller and more floating efect.
Waist with a button and zip
Very good vintage condition, yet it has some use stains almost due to the heavily coloured design and a slight peeling in some exposed parts. Both of these are due to the use but hardly noticeable when the garment is on. 

Size: s/m

Measures:

Waist: 36 cm; 14.17''
Length: 75 cms; 29,53''

80's Pink and black tartan mini-skirt with matching scarf
Two pockets
Flattering pattern
Colours: black, purple and pink
Current 38/40 Uk 8/10

Skirt Measures:

Matching Scarf Measures: 140x21cm; 55,12''x 8,27''

All measures are approximate and taken with the garment lying flat

name: CORAL PINK ELECTRO-TRASH SKIRT
description:
Vintage coral pink marbled patterned skirt. Probably 80's. Really on trend at the moment, perfect for dressing up at night. Could also be worn as a strapless dress if you stick it to your waist with a belt


Measures:
Waist: 38cm; 15 '' 
Length: 90cm; 35 ''
